item.title:
OBS Studio 32 is now available!
This release comes with our initial version of the Plugin Manager! We've also made additions and optimizations to NVIDIA RTX filters, and added hybrid MOV support.
item.description:
OBS Studio 32 is now available!
This release comes with our initial version of the Plugin Manager! We've also made additions and optimizations to NVIDIA RTX filters, and added hybrid MOV support. https://bsky.app/profile/obsproject.com/post/3lzrij2yie22j
